column.name: content
column.value: This plugin calculates the end date and amount of free trial discount order. It also populates the plan subscription order id on the discount order using an order level meta-field.

changeSet.author: Raushan Kumar Raj
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO notification_message (id, entity_id, type_id, language_id, use_flag, optlock) SELECT COALESCE((SELECT MAX(id) FROM notification_message), 0) + ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ent.id) AS id, ent.id, (SELECT MAX(id) FROM notification_message_type), 1, 1, 0 FROM entity ent;

INSERT INTO notification_medium_type (notification_id, medium_type) SELECT nm.id AS notification_id, mt.type AS medium_type FROM notification_message nm CROSS JOIN (SELECT 'EMAIL' AS type UNION SELECT 'SMS' UNION SELECT 'PDF') mt WHERE nm.type_id = 38;

INSERT INTO notification_message_section (id, message_id, section, optlock) SELECT (SELECT MAX(id) FROM notification_message_section) + ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY m.id) AS id, m.id, s.section, 0 AS optlock FROM notification_message m CROSS JOIN (SELECT 1 AS section UNION SELECT 2 AS section) s WHERE m.type_id = (SELECT foreign_id from international_description where content ='Notify Password Change');

INSERT INTO notification_message_line (id, message_section_id, content, optlock) SELECT (SELECT MAX(id) FROM notification_message_line) + ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ms.id) AS id, ms.id, CASE WHEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY message_id ORDER BY ms.id) % 2 = 1 THEN '[EarnBill] Your password was changed' ELSE 'The password for your EarnBill account $first_name $last_name was successfully changed.' || CHR(10) || CHR(10) || 'If you did not make this request, please contact support immediately.' || CHR(10) || CHR(10) || 'Thanks,' || CHR(10) || 'The EarnBill Team' END AS content, 0 AS optlock FROM notification_message_section ms WHERE message_id IN (SELECT id FROM notification_message WHERE type_id = (SELECT foreign_id FROM international_description WHERE content ='Notify Password Change'));

column.name: content
column.value: Generate payment url in generated invoices.

column.name: content
column.value: This plug-in will create payment urls when invoices are generated, and those payment urls can be used for payments.

changeSet.author: Ashwinkumar Patra
Parvati Thapa
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO notification_message (id, entity_id, type_id, language_id, use_flag, optlock) SELECT COALESCE((SELECT MAX(id) FROM notification_message), 0) + ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ent.id) AS id, ent.id, (SELECT MAX(id) FROM notification_message_type), 1, 1, 0 FROM entity ent;

INSERT INTO notification_medium_type (notification_id, medium_type) SELECT nm.id AS notification_id, mt.type AS medium_type FROM notification_message nm CROSS JOIN (SELECT 'EMAIL' AS type UNION SELECT 'SMS' UNION SELECT 'PDF') mt WHERE nm.type_id = 39;

INSERT INTO notification_message_section (id, message_id, section, optlock) SELECT (SELECT MAX(id) FROM notification_message_section) + ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY m.id) AS id, m.id, s.section, 0 AS optlock FROM notification_message m CROSS JOIN (SELECT 1 AS section UNION SELECT 2 AS section) s WHERE m.type_id = (SELECT foreign_id from international_description where content ='Notify Payment Link');

INSERT INTO notification_message_line (id, message_section_id, content, optlock) SELECT (SELECT MAX(id) FROM notification_message_line) + ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ms.id) AS id, ms.id, CASE WHEN ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY message_id ORDER BY ms.id) % 2 = 1 THEN '$company_name is requesting payment of $currency$paymentAmount (via $gateway_name)' ELSE CONCAT( 'Dear $username,', CHR(10), CHR(10), '$company_name has sent you a payment link for $currency$paymentAmount', CHR(10), CHR(10), 'Payment for : $Reason_for_payment', CHR(10), CHR(10), 'Gateway Reference Id : $gateway_id', CHR(10), CHR(10), 'Payment Link : $payment_link', CHR(10), CHR(10), 'This payment link will expire on : $payment_expiry', CHR(10), CHR(10), 'For any product or service related queries, contact ($url)', CHR(10), CHR(10), 'Thanks,', CHR(10), 'The EarnBill Team' ) END AS content, 0 AS optlock FROM notification_message_section ms WHERE message_id IN (SELECT id FROM notification_message WHERE type_id = (SELECT foreign_id FROM international_description WHERE content ='Notify Payment Link'));
